timeline.message:
[BEAM-9744] Remove --region option from SQL tests.

These tests don't run on Dataflow, so they don't recognize the region option.

timeline.bodyText: If they don't run on Dataflow, what is project and other gcp flags are used for?
timeline.author: aaltay

replies.bodyText: These tests use other GCP resources like BigQuery and Pub/Sub.
replies.author: ibzib
